mapper.select: SELECT * FROM reservation AS res INNER JOIN company AS com ON res.COMPANY_ID = com.COMPANY_ID INNER JOIN member_information AS mem ON res.ID = mem.ID
mapper.update: update reservation AS res INNER JOIN company AS com ON res.COMPANY_ID = com.COMPANY_ID set res.RESERVATION_DATE = #{RESERVATION_DATE}, res.RESERVATION_TIME = #{RESERVATION_TIME}, com.COMPANY_NAME = #{COMPANY_NAME} where ID = #{ID};
